verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> a <S%G2563>reed<s%> like <S%G3664>unto<s%> a <S%G4464>rod:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2476>stood,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1453>Rise,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3354>measure<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2379>altar,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> them that <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1722>therein.<s%> <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G833>court<s%> which is <S%G1855>without<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3485>temple<s%> <S%G1544>leave<s%> <S%G1854>out,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3354>measure<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G3361>not;<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> it is <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> shall they tread under <S%G3961>foot<s%> forty and <S%G5062>two<s%> <S%G1417><s%> <S%G3376>months.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> power unto <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they shall <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> a thousand two hundred and <S%G5507>threescore<s%> <S%G1250><s%> <S%G1835><s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in <S%G4526>sackcloth.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> if any <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G91>hurt<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G1607>proceedeth<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2719>devoureth<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2190>enemies:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> if any <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G91>hurt<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> in this <S%G3779>manner<s%> be <S%G615>killed.<s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G2808>shut<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it rain <S%G1026>not<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5205><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G5204>waters<s%> to <S%G4762>turn<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3960>smite<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4127>plagues,<s%> as often <S%G3740>as<s%> they <S%G2309>will.<s%> <S%G1437><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> they shall have <S%G5055>finished<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G3141>testimony,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2342>beast<s%> that <S%G305>ascendeth<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> bottomless <S%G12>pit<s%> shall <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%> <S%G3326>against<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G3528>overcome<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G848>their<s%> dead <S%G4430>bodies<s%> shall lie <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4113>street<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G4153>spiritually<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> was <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5443>kindreds<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1100>tongues<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> shall <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> dead <S%G4430>bodies<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G2255>half,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G863>suffer<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> dead <S%G4430>bodies<s%> to be <S%G5087>put<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3418>graves.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> make <S%G2165>merry,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> one to <S%G240>another;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G928>tormented<s%> them that <S%G2730>dwelt<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G2255>half<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G4228>feet;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> them which <S%G2334>saw<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Come <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G5602>hither.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> they ascended <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G3507>cloud;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> <S%G2334>beheld<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> there a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> tenth <S%G1182>part<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G4098>fell,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake<s%> were <S%G615>slain<s%> <S%G3686>of<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5505>thousand:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3062>remnant<s%> <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G1719>affrighted,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G932>kingdoms<s%> of this <S%G2889>world<s%> are <S%G1096>become<s%> the kingdoms of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he shall <S%G936>reign<s%> forever and <S%G1519>ever.<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G165><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> We give thee <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> <S%G4671><s%> O <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3841>Almighty,<s%> which art, and wast, and art to <S%G3801>come;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> thou hast <S%G2983>taken<s%> to thee <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1411>power,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> hast <S%G936>reigned.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> were <S%G3710>angry,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> is <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3498>dead,<s%> that they should be <S%G2919>judged,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that thou shouldest <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> unto <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> them that <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G3398>small<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shouldest <S%G1311>destroy<s%> them which <S%G1311>destroy<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G455>opened<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there was <S%G3700>seen<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3485>temple<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2787>ark<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1242>testament:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G796>lightnings,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5456>voices,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1027>thunderings,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> an <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5464>hail.<s%>
